mapper.select: select c.COMCODE,c.ENDDATE,c.DATAFLAG,c.ROE from gangao.COM_MAINFINAINDEXEXT c INNER JOIN ( select a.COMCODE FROM gangao.STK_BASICINFO a INNER JOIN (select STOCKCODE from datacenter.intelligent_stock) b on a.TRADINGCODE = b.STOCKCODE and a.SecuCategoryCodeII = '1001' )d on c.comcode = d.COMCODE and c.dataFlag = 101 and c.EndDate = #{endDate} and c.ReportType = #{reportType} ORDER BY c.comcode
